name: Cross-Agent Finding Handoff
description: Polls for unhandled Discussion findings with handoff labels, extracts rj-meta, and routes to the appropriate target agent for follow-up analysis.
process: Search Discussions for open handoffs: github_discussion_search with 'label:handoff NOT label:state:acknowledged'
For each unhandled Discussion: github_discussion_get to extract rj-meta block
Parse rj-meta to determine target agent and action requested
Label Discussion as state:acknowledged via github_discussion_label
Trigger target agent campaign via juggler_campaign_trigger if applicable
Reply to Discussion with acknowledgment comment including rj-meta response block

metrics.successCriteria: All pending handoffs acknowledged and routed
